channel.title: Need a Coder 614+ and a Forums Designer ASAP
channel.description:
Am looking at starting a RSPS which will involve PVP as well as an economy.
I have a budget of $1,000 for gold banners , advertisement fee's and a VPS I am aiming to get this server in to the top 5 RSPS's and I am most dedicated towards this project.
To achieve my aims I need the best of the best and now am asking you please do "NOT" reply or add my skype if you have no idea on how to code it's really starting to bug me!
Some stuff which I'd be looking at having on the server.
Donator area. Yell - Donators Vote point system 100% staking (duel arena) 100% working prayer - mage 100% matching armour stats (Runescape) Donator shop insisting of (Torva , pernix , spirit shields etc) Loyalty points (donator) Maybe a bit of PVM if your interested in adding it. Working friends chat Working private messaging Effects and GFX near to Runescape as possible Loyalty titles.. maybe every 50 kills. Dice ranks
Note: am not interested in custom items etc.
Basically looking to create an inspirational RSPS.
I'll either pay a one off fee once you've made it , or I'll pay a nominal fee and you can be a co-owner ( coder ) something of which I'd prefer.
I also need a forum designer/administrator.
I want to see proof of your previous work so I know am not hiring a complete an utter idiot.
Now please don't pm me or add my skype if you can only code basic servers.
Pm me or add my skype "ohKaizen"
Thanks,
Era.

item.title: Need a Coder 614+ and a Forums Designer ASAP
item.dc:creator: @EraHere EraHere
item.description:
@EraHere wrote:

So were do you reccomend i find one?

Read full topic

item.title: Need a Coder 614+ and a Forums Designer ASAP
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

The best coder you’ll find here just copy’s code from other code and adds it to their code. Besides the like 10 people here that actually know what their doing.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a Coder 614+ and a Forums Designer ASAP

item.title: Need a Coder 614+ and a Forums Designer ASAP
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

Looks like someone wants to use others.

so many facepalm topics in this section of the forum.

You will not get “pro” coders into your team like this man.

Read full topic
